p: Colorimetric and fluorescence measurements were performed on a 96-well transparent and black microplates (both from Nunclon, Nunc; Roskilde, Denmark), respectively, using an Infinite Pro 200F microplate reader from Tecan Group Ltd. (MÃ¤nnedorf, Switzerland). The evaporation of extracts was conducted using a Heidolph Basis Hei-VAP Value evaporator (Schwabach, Germany). Lyophilization was performed in the Free Zone 1 apparatus (Labcono, Kansas City, KS, USA).
